attributes.action: require all Paedophiles to register all their Computer I.P Addresses as well as their E-Mail addresses and Chatroom names.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sex offenders should be legal obliged, ordered and required to register their e-mail addresses, chatroom names and I.P computer addresses. Whilst it is very easy to changes ones E-Mail addresses and Chatroom Names, it is very much more difficult and expensive to change the I.P Address that is linked to each individual computer. I.P Addresses are routinedly collected by many organisations to combat fraud, so why not to monitor paedophiles and persons on the Sex Offenders Register.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "require all Paedophiles to register all their Computer I.P Addresses as well as their E-Mail addresses and Chatroom names."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14877.asp

Prime Minister's Office
